events.name: Trail run
events.summary: Easy run on the beautiful trails in one of the largest urban parks in the United States. We'll start at the MacLeay Park trailhead. Street parking is available at the trailhead and the surrounding neighborhood.

events.name: Welcome reception
events.summary: Join us for drinks and snacks at this popular local brewing company's brew pub in Portland's famous Pearl District.

events.name: River run
events.summary: Easy run along the Willamette River, starting from the Marriott Downtown Waterfront hotel. We'll cover both sides of the river in a clockwise loop.

events.name: Ceremony, reception
events.summary: The big event! Short ceremony, followed by cocktail hour, dinner, and dancing.
